@Template[type:emanation|distance:60] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Aura]

Details of the mutant's appearance are disturbing and unnatural in the extreme. A non-mutant living creature who begins their turn within 60 feet of the mutant must succeed at a Fortitude save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}. A creature who succeeds at its save is then temporarily immune to the aura for 24 hours.
